remarks: If two structures have the same ring components (properties), one is a division ring iff the other one is.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
statement:
drngprop.b $e |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) $.
drngprop.p $e |- ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` L ) $.
drngprop.m $e |- ( .r ` K ) = ( .r ` L ) $.
drngprop $p |- ( K e. DivRing <-> L e. DivRing ) $.
